data.message: Thank you for the incredible video!  It's unfortunate that so many on this post are either uneducated and don't know how to research to find the truth about DJT (I refused to call him President ) or have the ability  to make up their own minds , and not follow  like sheep.

replies.message: He is your president regardless if you like him or not.
I just refuse to call him President. .I did not say he wasn't President. ..
Dara Morgan nobody cares what you choose to do. Your opinion is as irrelevant as an over the hill white 40+ y/o rapper.
I thought his video was really to the point , and well done . And Michael   my post didn't mean to get your pantys in a wad.  And as you read my opinion  must matter. ....
To call anyone a fool who disagrees with your view is pretty rediculous.
Dara Morgan was I suppose to assume your comment was an opinion before reading it? Dumbass.
To whom did I call a fool?
Well Michel we all know what to assume means......
Get real ppl 2017 Eminem sucks our crappy govenments (cuz there's more fucked up things going on than just trump) taint
His video sounded like CNN news when all of them got drunk on new years.
